mapper.select: Select a.app_id, a.app_name, b.subject, b.user_id, b.doc_no, b.bd_category, b.create_date, b.bd_count, b.good_count From bd_free b, app_info a Where a.app_id = b.app_id And user_id = #{user_id}
Select s.user_id, a.app_name, m.* From bd_free m, bd_free_good s, app_info a Where m.doc_no = s.doc_no And m.app_id = a.app_id And s.user_id = #{user_id}

Select info.app_name, free.doc_no, comt.comment_context, comt.comment_doc_no, comt.create_date From app_info info, bd_free free, bd_free_comt comt Where info.app_id = free.app_id And free.doc_no = comt.doc_no And comt.user_id = #{user_id}
